short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance digital well-being! This plugin assesses online habits, like fitness trackers gauge activity. Data stays local for privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Charm is about knowing how the web affects you. It implements information analysis algorithms from research papers to check the feel and focus of sites you visit. Think of it like a Fitbit for your online life. All your data stays on your machine, keeping your privacy in check.
